title: Ranveer Singh‚Äôs new outfit reminds Twitter of condoms, sperm and laminated items | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Ranveer Singh‚Äôs new outfit reminds Twitter of condoms, sperm and laminated items 
Ranveer Singh wore an interesting outfit to Shahid Kapoor‚Äôs pre-birthday bash on Sunday and let Twitter have a field day. Here are a few hilarious tweets. bollywood Updated: Feb 21, 2017 16:04 IST Hindustan Times Ranveer Singh during Shahid Kapoor‚Äôs pre-birthday bash.(IANS) 
Shahid Kapoor threw a pre-birthday bash for himself on Sunday but guest Ranveer Singh made sure it was he who caught the most eyeballs with his whacky outfit. 
Ranveer, who is known for his atrocious choice in fashion, turned up at the party in a white, hooded onesie with black stripes running from his neck to his right arm. 
Of course, the outfit got him a lot of attention on Twitter where trolls compared him to condoms, plastics bags, laminated things and even sperm.Here are a few examples of merciless trolling: I love that #RanveerSingh is finally part of the live action #SpaceGhost coast to coast remake üôè pic.twitter.com/P3MMpuBmsE ‚Äî Rohitav Sharma (@rohitavsharma) February 20, 2017 Assassin's Creed : The Indian journey #RanveerSingh pic.twitter.com/6p5Eo8nq07 ‚Äî Alvin McStill (@freetimetweets) February 20, 2017 Someone please tell #RanveerSingh to stop following Lady Gaga. ‚Äî Corn Flakes (@ankittalukdar) February 20, 2017 Mom- Apne aap ko aache se cover karna bahar thand bahut hai .Ranveer singh- * Takes table cloth * okay mom pic.twitter.com/ks6wtgGitA
